scripts.build:app: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:e2e-client: docker build -f client/Dockerfile.configured -t $CLIENT_BASE_IMAGE_NAME:$CLIENT_BASE_IMAGE_TAG . --build-arg CLIENT_BASE_IMAGE_NAME=montepouli_client --build-arg CLIENT_BASE_IMAGE_TAG=latest --build-arg CLIENT_TYPE=e2e
scripts.build:e2e-environment: npm run build:app && npm run build:e2e-client && docker-compose -f docker-compose-e2e.yml build
scripts.start:e2e-environment-base: npm run build:e2e-environment && docker-compose -f docker-compose-e2e.yml up
scripts.start:e2e-environment:local: npm run build:e2e-environment && docker-compose -f docker-compose-e2e-local.yml up -d
scripts.docker-compose-rebuild: docker-compose build && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker-compose-rebuild-no-cache: docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d
